page.title: 10SHOTESHAM/HOWE HOUSING 1
page.content:
Homes in the area are divided into 2 groups: rented and private. Some of the houses are of historic interest are listed as being of special note . {RENTED ACCOMODATION}is both Council owned and tied. Council homes are semi_detached and have all the basic amenities including inside toilets. There are bungalows for young marrieds or elderly tenants. All have large gardens. There are very few tied cottages.
{PRIVATE HOMES}are very mixed in age and style. They date from Tudor times to the present although remaining traditional in style. Virtually all this housing stock is in a good state of repair and has all the basic amenities, though for some this is a recent addition.
